casebody.data:
Tillman v. Fontaine. The present case is no exception to the rule that the first grant of a new trial should be acquiesced in. April 9, 1894.

Argued at the last term.

Levy and claim. Before Judge Willis. City court of Columbus. April term, 1898. Peabody, Brannon, Hatcher & Martin, for plaintiff. Little & Wimbish and McNeill & Levy, for claimant.

Judgment affirmed.
